text: Trashigang District is one of the 20 districts in Bhutan. The administrative centre is Trashigang. It used to be part of an important trade route connecting Assam to Tibet. There are fifteen village blocks: *Bartsham Gewog *Bidung Gewog *Kanglung Gewog *Kangpara Gewog *Khaling Gewog *Lumang Gewog *Merak Gewog *Phongmey Gewog *Radhi Gewog *Sakten Gewog *Samkhar Gewog *Shongphu Gewog *Thrimshing Gewog *Uzorong Gewog *Yangneer Gewog Category:Districts of Bhutan
title: Trashigang District
